columns.name: dhcp_options_id
columns.description: The ID of the set of DHCP options.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the DHCP options set.

columns.name: domain_name
columns.description: The domain name for instances. This value is used to complete unqualified DNS hostnames.

columns.name: domain_name_servers
columns.description: The IP addresses of up to four domain name servers, or AmazonProvidedDNS.

columns.name: netbios_name_servers
columns.description: The IP addresses of up to four NetBIOS name servers.

columns.name: ntp_servers
columns.description: The IP addresses of up to four Network Time Protocol (NTP) servers.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to vpc dhcp options.
